data.description: The extruder train used for printing all walls. This is used by multi-extrusion machines.
data.img_description: This model is printed with a white material and the wall extruder set to print the second extruder, which contained black material.
data.hints:
- Printing the walls with a different material can alter the aesthetics and strength properties of a print.
- Printing the walls with a different nozzle size can increase print speed.
